com.mlt.desktop.control

Class Control

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.mlt.desktop.control.Control
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    BooleanEditor, Button, Canvas, ComboBox, Label, MenuBar, MenuItem, Pane, PopupMenu, ProgressBar, ScrollBar, ScrollPane, SplitPane, Table, TabPane, TextArea, TextField, TextPane, ToolBar

    public class Control
extends java.lang.Object
    Base control, essentially a component wrapper, intended to expose only the methods of component used around this library.
    Author:
    Miquel Sas

    • Method Detail

      • getAllControls

        public static java.util.List<Control> getAllControls(Control sourceControl)
        Return a list with all controls in the tree containing the argument control.
        Parameters:
        sourceControl - The control to start scanning first up (parents) and then down (children).
        Returns:
        The list with all controls in the tree containing the control.

      • getAllChildControls

        public static java.util.List<Control> getAllChildControls(Control sourceControl)
        Return a list with all controls in the tree starting at the argument control.
        Parameters:
        sourceControl - The control to start scanning.
        Returns:
        The list with all controls in the tree containing the control.
